greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of triangle A215200.
comment: The unsigned version of A215200 is A054521 which has as row sums the Euler totient function A000010.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} (n-k | k) where (i | j) is the Kronecker symbol.
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[ KroneckerSymbol[n - k, k], {k, 1, n}]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 81}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 02 2013 *)
program: def A215200_row(n): return [kronecker_symbol(n-k, k) for k in (1..n)]
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Aug 07 2012
